column5: Revisiting an old topic, sorry...Any recommendations on where I can get bait when crossing at Fr. Francis? I would like to find a shop that has late hours if possible becasue we will probably get in late, stay the night and leave very early if we can pick up bait. thanks for your help
There is a good bait shop on the highwy on the east end of Ft. Francis. Sorry Can't remmember the name.LOL and get bitDave from Iowa
